main.name: Michael Pretorius
main.bio: I am a hard-working individual, a great team player & a natural eader. Actively committed to the goals and morals of the organization I represent, new challenges continue to shape and mould me into a more creative and efficient engineer. Adapting to new technologies is my speciality, I always incorporate out of the box methods.

Developing crucial engineering skills to become a sustainable & renewable forward-thinking inventor of the future. 
 Mechatronics is an interdisciplinary branch of engineering that focuses on the engineering of electronic, electrical and mechanical engineering systems, and also includes a combination of robotics, electronics, computer, telecommunications, systems, control, and product engineering
